ADOMManagementContainer.ADOMCloneMemoryComponent - Class in de.dfki.oms.adom
Restlet for the node [host]/mgmt/cloneMemory to which an XML string containing a memory can be POSTed in order to clone that memory with all blocks and data as a new memory on the OMS.
ADOMManagementContainer.ADOMCreateMemoryComponent - Class in de.dfki.oms.adom
Restlet for the node [host]/mgmt/createMemory to which an XML string describing a memory can be POSTed in order to create that memory as a fresh and empty OMM on the OMS.
ADOMManagementContainer.ADOMGetMemoryList - Class in de.dfki.oms.adom
Restlet for the node [host]/mgmt/memoryList where a GET request is answered with an array of Strings, containing the names of all memories on the OMS (as a JSON object).
